## Loading the cleaned data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

data <- read_csv("data/ANES_grants_data.csv")

```

## Preliminary models

```{r}
first.lm <- lm(voted ~ disabled*after_hava + external_efficacy_index + central + south + west + age, data = data)
summary(first.lm)
```

```{r}
data_subset <- data |>
  filter(!is.na(total_grant))

grant_model.lm <- lm(voted ~ disabled + disabled*external_efficacy_index + 
                       total_grant*central + total_grant*south + total_grant*west, data = 
                       data_subset)
summary(grant_model.lm)
```

```{r}
data_subset_adj <- data_subset |>
  mutate(years_since_HAVA = year - 2002)

lm <- lm(voted ~ disabled*years_since_HAVA + disabled*external_efficacy_index +
           total_grant + central + south + west + )
```
